org.openimaj.io.wrappers

Class Writeable2DArrayBinary

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openimaj.io.wrappers.Writeable2DArrayBinary
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    WriteableBinary

    public class Writeable2DArrayBinary
extends Object
implements WriteableBinary
    A wrapper for an array that is writeable.
    Author:
    Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)
